boons.name: Tempest Strike
boons.description: Your Attack deals more damage and knocks foes away.
boons.notes: Tier 1
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Tempest Flourish
boons.description: Your Special deals more damage and knocks foes away.
boons.notes: Tier 1
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Flood Shot
boons.description: Your Cast damages foes in an area and knocks them away.
boons.notes:
Tier 1
  • Damage Radius: 500
  • Impact Velocity: 2500
  • Cannot be combined with Aspect of Beowulf
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Flood Flare
boons.description: Your Cast damages foes around you and knocks them away.
boons.notes: Tier 1
boons.prerequisites: Unique to Aspect of Beowulf

boons.name: Tidal Dash
boons.description: Your Dash damages foes in an area and knocks them away.
boons.notes:
Tier 1
  • Damage Radius: 300
  • Impact Velocity: 2500
  • Sometimes stuns foes on impact.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Poseidon's Aid
boons.description: Your Call makes you surge into foes while Impervious for 1.2 Sec.
boons.notes:
Tier 1
  • Max Gauge Bonus: 7.2 Sec. Duration
  • Impact Velocity: 3500
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Typhoon's Fury
boons.description: You deal more damage when slamming foes into barriers.
boons.notes:
Tier 1
  • Will only proc with Boon-enabled knock-away. Will not proc on shield attack, sword lunge, etc.
boons.prerequisites: Tempest Strike, Tidal Dash, Flood Shot, Tempest Flourish, or Poseidon's Aid

boons.name: Hydraulic Might
boons.description: Your Attack and Special are stronger the first 10 Sec. in Encounter(s).
boons.notes: Tier 1
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Ocean's Bounty
boons.description: Any , or chamber rewards are worth more.
boons.notes: Tier 1
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Sunken Treasure
boons.description: Gain an assortment of , , and .

rarity.common:
Obols Awarded: 50–70
Health Awarded: 1–3 items
Darkness Awarded: 50-100
Chance of Nectar: 10%
Chance of Diamond: 0.03%

boons.notes:
Tier 1
  • Consumable
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Razor Shoals
boons.description: Using knock-away effects also Rupture foes.
boons.notes:
Tier 2
  • Will only proc with Boon-enabled knock-away. Will not proc on shield attack, sword lunge, etc.
boons.prerequisites: Flood Shot, Poseidon's Aid, Tempest Flourish, Tempest Strike, or Tidal Dash

boons.name: Boiling Point
boons.description: Your God Gauge charges faster when you take damage.
boons.notes: Tier 2
boons.prerequisites: Aphrodite's Aid, Ares' Aid, Artemis' Aid, Athena's Aid, Demeter's Aid, Dionysus' Aid, Poseidon's Aid, or Zeus' Aid

boons.name: Breaking Wave
boons.description: Slamming foes into walls or corners creates a watery blast in the area.
boons.notes:
Tier 2
  • Will work without Boon-enabled knock-away. Will proc with shield attack, sword lunge, etc.
boons.prerequisites: Flood Shot, Poseidon's Aid, Tempest Flourish, Tempest Strike, or Tidal Dash

boons.name: Wave Pounding
boons.description: Your boons with Knock-Away effects deal bonus damage to bosses.
boons.notes:
Tier 2
  • Will only proc with Boon-enabled knock-away. Will not proc on shield attack, sword lunge, etc.
boons.prerequisites: Flood Shot, Poseidon's Aid, Tempest Flourish, Tempest Strike, or Tidal Dash

boons.name: Rip Current
boons.description: Your Call pulls in foes and the effect lasts longer.
boons.notes: Tier 2
boons.prerequisites: Poseidon's Aid

boons.name: Huge Catch
boons.description: You have a greater chance to find Fishing Point in each Chamber.
boons.notes:
Tier 3
  • Fish Spawn Chance: +20%
  • This boon also removes the Chambers Since Last Fishing Point spawn requirement.
  • Your first encounter with this boon will be scripted to appear in the first chamber as the only choice, ignoring prerequisites. This happens only once.
boons.prerequisites: Ocean's Bounty and Sunken Treasure or Conch Shell

boons.name: Second Wave
boons.description: Your knock-away effects shove foes a second time after the first.
boons.notes:
Tier 3
  • Second Knockback Delay: 0.7 Sec.
  • Will only proc with Boon-enabled knock-away. Will not proc on shield attack, sword lunge, etc.
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Breaking Wave or Typhoon's Fury
  • Flood Shot, Poseidon's Aid, Tempest Flourish, Tempest Strike, or Tidal Dash

boons.name: Sweet Nectar
boons.description:
Any Poms of Power you find are more effective.
  • Bonus Lv. from Poms: +1
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Poseidon: Tempest Strike, Tempest Flourish, Flood Shot, Tidal Dash, or Poseidon's Aid
  • Aphrodite: Passion Dash, Crush Shot, Heartbreak Strike, Heartbreak Flourish, or Aphrodite's Aid

boons.name: Curse of Drowning
boons.description:
Your Cast is a pulse that deals damage to foes around you.
  • Pulses per Cast: 3
boons.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Mirage Shot or Blizzard Shot
  • Cannot be combined with Aspect of Hera
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Poseidon: Flood Shot
  • Ares: Ares' Aid, Blade Dash, Curse of Agony, or Curse of Pain

boons.name: Mirage Shot
boons.description:
Your Cast fires a second projectile, though it has reduced damage.
  • Secondary Shot Damage: 30%
boons.notes: Cannot be combined with Curse of Drowning
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Poseidon: Flood Shot, Poseidon's Aid, Tempest Flourish, Tempest Strike, or Tidal Dash
  • Artemis: Artemis' Aid, Deadly Flourish, Deadly Strike, or True Shot

boons.name: Unshakable Mettle
boons.description:
You cannot be stunned, and resist some damage from Bosses.
  • Boss Damage Reduction: +10%
boons.notes: Bosses include the Furies, the Bone Hydra, the Heroes of Elysium, the Secret Boss, and Final Boss.
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Poseidon: Flood Shot, Poseidon's Aid, Tempest Flourish, Tempest Strike, or Tidal Dash
  • Athena: Athena's Aid, Divine Dash, Divine Flourish, Divine Strike, or Phalanx Shot

boons.name: Blizzard Shot
boons.description:
Your Cast moves slowly, piercing foes and firing shards around it.
  • Shard Damage: 20
boons.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Aspect of Beowulf
  • Cannot be combined with Curse of Drowning
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Poseidon: Flood Shot
  • Demeter: Demeter's Aid, Frost Flourish, Frost Strike, or Mistral Dash

boons.name: Exclusive Access
boons.description:
Any Boons you find have superior effects.
  • Minimum Boon Rarity: Epic
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Poseidon: Flood Shot, Poseidon's Aid, Tempest Flourish, Tempest Strike, or Tidal Dash
  • Dionysus: Dionysus' Aid, Drunken Dash, Drunken Flourish, Drunken Strike, or Trippy Shot

boons.name: Sea Storm
boons.description:
Your knock-away effects also cause foes to be struck by lightning.
  • Lightning Damage 40
boons.notes: * Will proc without Boon-enabled knock-away. Will proc on shield attack, sword lunge, etc.
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Poseidon: Flood Shot, Poseidon's Aid, Tempest Flourish, or Tempest Strike
  • Zeus: Electric Shot, Lightning Strike, Thunder Dash, Thunder Flourish, or Zeus' Aid

curse.name: ruptured
curse.description: For 3 Seconds, victim takes rapid damage every 0.2 seconds while moving.
